page.title: 13LIFE STYLES
page.content: THE PARTICULAR AREA ALLOCATED TO THE SCHOOL HAS A SINGULAR LACK OF AMENITIES, MAINLY BECAUSE OF ITS HIGHLY AGRICULTURAL BACKGROUND. THE MAIN EMPLOYERS ARE THE SUGAR-BEET FACTORY, AND THE LOCAL FARMERS. MOST OF THE EMPLOYEES OF THE SUGAR-BEET FACTORY TRAVEL IN FROM OUTSIDE THE LOCAL COMMUNITY. THERE ARE TWO DISTINCT TYPES OF PERSONNAL LIVING IN THE AREA- THOSE THAT HAVE LIVED IN THE AREA ALL THEIR LIVES, AND WHOSE JOB HOLDS THEM TO THIS AREA. THERE IS ALSO THE PEOPLE WHO HAVE MOVED INTO THE AREA BECAUSE OF THEIR JOBS, AND CAN AFFORD THE NEW LUXURY DEVELOPMENTS THAT HAVE BEEN BUILD AROUND THE OLDER VILLAGES. THE ADMASTON SPA DEVELOPMENT IS A VERY GOOD EXAMPLE OF THIS.
